text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha krob knea( anak mean chomnue ning kmean chomnue) ku sotthote rngcham meul( karosanyea robsa trong) dau che neah chaur anak teangoasaknea rngcham meul choh. puok anak nung doeng tha anaknea daer tam meakra da troemotrauv ning anaknea del ban ttuol kar changaoulobangheanh ( pi a l laoh)
